channel.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week - #04 - Winner announced
channel.description:
<big> **====> ‚ì£—èùìê·∂ú“ú œÉùñã ùê≠‚íΩ·∫∏ ÔΩó—î‚Ç¨–∫** </big>
**‚ì¶hat happens?** > * Each week a new topic (like this one) is posted in the #contests category. > * If you want your track considered for track of the week, just post a Soundcloud link to your track below, before the due date listed at the bottom of this topic. > * The winner will be announced here at the end of the week.
**‚ì°ules:** >1. Track must be made by the submitter, using Auxy. >2. There are no set themes. Any genre. Any tempo. Any automations. >3. Tracks must be 60-seconds or longer. >4. Tracks can't have been posted previously. This competition is for new releases. >5. One entry per person, per week. >6. No collabs or remixes. >7. You can edit your post during the week if you make updates to your submission. >9. External samples can be used for individual instruments or vocals only ie: not sections of sampled music or drum loops. >10. Project files won't be considered. Soundcloud links only. >11. Late entries won't be considered. Enter in the next week instead. >12. Please also create a thread for your track under #tracks, like usual.
**‚ìôudging:** One winner chosen each week, or possibly a draw. Judging will be totally subjective. Please don't ask why your track didn't win. The judge this week is @HYDRANS
**‚ìürize** * Winner gets a special üíø icon next to their forum name. * Winner's name is also listed in a [winner's thread](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-track-of-the-week-winners/15961).
![Auxy%20Track%20of%20the%20Week|350x350,100%](upload://ia7OKbSnziVU4UHv8vbhMQqNOQx.jpeg) <small>*Logo created by @Arimyth </small>

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week - #04 - Winner announced
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
‚ì¶ho is the winner?

The judge this week was @Hydrans and he‚Äôs chosen the winner for week 4. He said: ‚ÄúI love the atmosphere and small details in this tune that add to the overall chill vibe‚Äù

Congratulations to @Ninjendo for winning, with his track: A Tune to BJs.

The winner receives a icon next to their forum name.

And their name is recorded as a Track of the Week Winner .

The thread for next weeks competition will be posted soon.

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week - #04 - Winner announced
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
====> ‚ì£—èùìê·∂ú“ú œÉùñã ùê≠‚íΩ·∫∏ ÔΩó—î‚Ç¨–∫

‚ì¶hat happens?

  • Each week a new topic (like this one) is posted in the #contests category.
  • If you want your track considered for track of the week, just post a Soundcloud link to your track below, before the due date listed at the bottom of this topic.
  • The winner will be announced here at the end of the week.

‚ì°ules:

  1. Track must be made by the submitter, using Auxy.
  2. There are no set themes. Any genre. Any tempo. Any automations.
  3. Tracks must be 60-seconds or longer.
  4. Tracks can‚Äôt have been posted previously. This competition is for new releases.
  5. One entry per person, per week.
  6. No collabs or remixes.
  7. You can edit your post during the week if you make updates to your submission.
  8. External samples can be used for individual instruments or vocals only
    ie: not sections of sampled music or drum loops.
  9. Project files won‚Äôt be considered. Soundcloud links only.
  10. Late entries won‚Äôt be considered. Enter in the next week instead.
  11. Please also create a thread for your track under #tracks, like usual.

‚ìôudging:
One winner chosen each week, or possibly a draw. Judging will be totally subjective. Please don‚Äôt ask why your track didn‚Äôt win. The judge this week is @HYDRANS

‚ìürize

  • Winner gets a special icon next to their forum name.
  • Winner‚Äôs name is also listed in a winner‚Äôs thread.


*Logo created by @Arimyth

Read full topic
